website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to add some elegance to the right ceiling fan. Creates subtle yet unique light patterns from the swirled marble cover.
pros: Visually appealing design great for vintage and traditional interior styles
Light shade protects the bulbs from dust and damage, extending their life
cons: Light shade is fragile if not handled with extra care

customer_reviews.title: Missing Huntington light pieces - BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: My son broke the glass bowl on his Huntington fan awhile ago. I found a bunch of light fixture type kits but dragged my feet on buying one because I was scared it wasn’t going to fit our specific fan. Boy, was I wrong! This kit comes with SO many parts and colors of covers and finials, I have trouble imagining a Huntington fan it wouldn’t work with! I should’ve bought it awhile ago. It took me 10 minutes total to sort through the pieces and figure out what I needed... although to be fair, we were just missing a bowl and the two last pieces. Either way, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Updated old fans
customer_reviews.text: Existing ceiling fans still worked perfectly but we had grown to hate the four bulb light fixtures...hard to clean, hung low and looked very dated. Decided to replace them with these fixtures and it worked perfectly. Fans look cleaner, more modern and will be much easier to clean. A little pricey but much cheaper and easier than replacing a perfectly good fan.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Happy with lights
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these dual light kits as I needed to replace two normal fixtures with light fixtures that can be turned off independently. These were nice looking and matched decor well. Probably the only light kits that I found that were up to typical light fixture standards in a bedroom. They installed fairly easy and both operate well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hunter Fan Light Kits
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! I ordered 3 Hunter Fan 28568 Dual Use Light Kits with Swirled Marble and White. Overall they were easy to install. They come assembled to install as a single light fixture (not attached to a fan) and must be disassembled to attach to fan; this was a clearly described but tedious task. Took about an hour to install first one and about 30 minutes each for the next two. They made the old plain fans look great and added lots of needed overhead light to the room. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light kit to replace one that had stopped working in my daughter's room. It was easy to swap out (Hunter ceiling fan), and it exceeded my expectations. The previous light kit (which looked exactly the same) required decorative bulbs, and this one will accept standard CFL bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sphynx

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan light kit. The glass is etched perfectly to create a warm glow in the room. This was used to replace one of the standard light kits on the fan in our bedroom. Definitely added much class to an already great bedroom design.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light kit!
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long for my son in law to install this light kit, so I did it myself! Easier then I expected and once I sorted through all the extra parts it took maybe 30 minutes to install. That is so great they added all the extra colors and parts so you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy refurbished
customer_reviews.text: I bought these refurbished, and they came with a mish mash of parts, but neither set had all the needed parts. If I had to do it again, is but new.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Dining Room Ceiling Light
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this product that we are going to purchase another and change the light kit on the ceiling fan in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Hunter quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, nice quality, and fits my existing Hunter fan well. Lots of mounting options (the instructions are good, not great) and different finishes of hardware in the box. The glass shade is attractive . Easy job.
customer_reviews.author: end123

customer_reviews.title: Great fan kit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great I was going to buy a new fan but I bought the light kit and what a difference. Saved me a lot of money by not buying a new fan and installing it !
customer_reviews.author: frank ornelaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Well done. Easy install. Great directions. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Durick

customer_reviews.title: Light Kit has a nice channel method to allow the fan pull chain to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well on my old hunter fan. I did not need any of the attachments as it screwed into the original base plate of the fan. Light Kit has a nice channel method to allow the fan pull chain to be routed through the light.
customer_reviews.author: Larryfromthecorner

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3. Looks awesome with my new Hunter fans. Son did installation on our new screened in deck.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised and lit up a dark room. Looks good and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install as a light kit for an existing hunter fan. You need to remove the bracket prior to hooking it up to the fan but that was simple with an adjustable wrench. Looks nice in our family room connected to a 14 year old hunter fan. Its nice that it included hardware in multiple finishes to match your fan's finish. Our's was antique brass that was difficult to find anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amy471

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this light kit to my twenty year old hunter fan bolted right no with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought wrong item return process was easy though and item just as described
customer_reviews.author: M****** Moore

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PACKAGING, VERY THICK GLASS
customer_reviews.text: GOOD PACKAGING, VERY THICK GLASS, GOOD QUALITY ALL OVER. VERY IMPRESSED WITH HUNTER. i PUT THE KIT ON AN OLD CASABLANCA FAN AND EVERYTHING WENT LIKE IT WAS SUPPOSED TO. GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Medus

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SERVICE-Great product
customer_reviews.text: My shade was broken. I contacted the company and heard back immediately. I sent a pic to them and they had a replacement in the mail the next day. OUTSTANDING service and beautiful shade. White opaque with swirls-looks perfect on my Hunter dark brown fan. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: great light I have bought 5 of them
customer_reviews.text: great light I have bought 5 of them!! need another! very comprehensive kit, lots of hardware!
customer_reviews.author: Star 63

customer_reviews.title: Easy insulation and great improvement
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Directions were great. Hunter product works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hockett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: This Hunter globe fits my Hunter fan to a 'T'. Easy to install and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Valley1

customer_reviews.title: really like the swirl design in the glass
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, really like the swirl design in the glass, looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Trina Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. Has multiple fitting options, so it would even fit my 10+ year old Hunter fan. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Good price for nice light kit. Arrived very quickly and as described. Recommend product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hunter Fan
customer_reviews.text: With all the optional finish choices you can't go wrong. Beautiful addition to our Hunter Fan.
customer_reviews.author: graywolf201

customer_reviews.title: Light Up My Life!
customer_reviews.text: Broke one that came with the Fan, replaced with this. Fits prefectly, looks great, and priced just right.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Murray

customer_reviews.title: Installation was simple enough for me with good mechanical skills and limited electrical skills
customer_reviews.text: The Hunter Fan Light Kit worked well for me. They provided ample parts to pick through to interface with my "Hunter Original" Fan. Installation was simple enough for me with good mechanical skills and limited electrical skills. Functionally, I get ample lighting for the room that it services.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Lee Woofter

customer_reviews.title: Replaced down globes raises it up enough that I do ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced down globes raises it up enough that I do not bang into it and it gives just as much illumination as the four down globes
customer_reviews.author: Aerie Heights

customer_reviews.title: HUNTER REMAIN TOPS IN MY BOOK...AWESOME LIGHT THAT IS EASY TO INSTALL OR PIECE OUT.
customer_reviews.text: I took a guess with measurements that can not be made perfectly, so I took a chance on this. Mind you all I need was the glass. BAM! Perfeict fit and finish that nearly was identical to my original Hunter fans glass. I'M SO FREAKIN' HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked and fit great but the bulb is not dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: cpiner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the pic but didnt fit my Hunter fan.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: No free return for error
customer_reviews.text: I have a prime membership, and other returns have been free, so imagine my surprise when I ended up having to pay $9.00 to return this item. New sure it is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Read description carefully
customer_reviews.text: All I needed was the glass part. Product descriptions are a little vague as to "bowl light" being different from "light bowl". I searched under "replacement parts". I am keeping it because the bowl is the item I needed but I am not happy to pay for more than I needed. Now I have to figure out who can use the rest of the assembly. Just be more clear on product descriptions and what shows up in your descriptions. A lighting kit is an add-on, not a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Bidlack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light kit. Gives off softer light so it’s good for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: bondog

customer_reviews.title: You will be pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: It turned out to be nicer than I thought. It looks nice on the lamp I have.
customer_reviews.author: TimP

product_meta.title: Hunter 28568 Dual Use Light Kit with Swirled Marble and White finials, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description: The versatile Hunter 2-Light Swirled Marble Dual-Use Light Kit installs either as a ceiling-fan accessory light or as an independent, semi-flush ceiling light. This fixture comes with finials and hardware in multiple finishes to match to a host of interior decors and it conveniently includes two 14-watt CFLs for added value. The Hunter Fan Company. A Commitment to Excellence for Over 100 Years. Our heritage of 19th-century craftsmanship, combined with 21st-century design and innovation, ensures that every product we make is as tough on the inside as it is beautiful on the outside. Backed by our tradition of excellence, you know you can count on everything Hunter makes for unmatched quality, style and whisper-quiet performance.
feature_bullets: Mounts as either a ceiling-fan accessory light or a semi-flush ceiling light
Swirled-marble glass globe for a distinctive look.For indoor use only
Comes with brushed nickel, white, new bronze and antique brass finials and hardware to match your decor
Uses two 14 Watt Compact Fluorescent Bulbs (Included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
